quotes.quote: Those who do not want to advance spiritually are fools.
Is it painful to be the person who waits? Or is it more painful to be the person who makes others wait? Either way, there's no need to wait anymore. That's what is most painful.

Just as planets seek the light of a star and circle around it, I was a planet that sought the light of a pure star. Even the moon can't shine by itself. It shines so brightly because it reflects light from the sun.
Hope and passion slip through your fingers like sand.

Still I've never thought of myself as an unfortunate person. Of course I am not a fortunate person either. In the first place a fortunate person could never write plays or novels. I write while loving my misfortune almost as if I'm tasting it.
